quote_text: Identity is a prison you can never escape, but the way to redeem your past is not to run from it, but to try to understand it, and use it as a foundation to grow.
author: Jay-Z

quote_text: Good news is you came a long way, bad news is you went the wrong way.
author: J. Cole

quote_text: The cost of something is the amount of life you give up for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote_text: Forward momentum, as long as there is imagination left.
author: Walt Disney

quote_text: I feel strange every day like something 'bout to happen bad. Prepared for the worst, anticipate the best. I think positive, but my thoughts have undertones. I do my best to keep it balanced, but it thunder rolls.
author: Mobb Deep

quote_text: If this is rich then take me back to being broke and bummy.
author: Russ

quote_text: Tough people last, tough times don't.
author: Nas

quote_text: How you take them losses and keep pushin' forward? I keep a chin up like a boy in front me.
author: Sheff G

quote_text: Become who you want, don't be a slave to the person you were.
author: Russ

quote_text: The older you get, the more expensive lessons will be.
author: Russ

quote_text: Yeah, you wished for it, me, I worked for it.
author: Russ

quote_text: Don't try to change the world, find something that you love and do it every day. Do that for the rest of your life, and eventually, the world will change.
author: Macklemore

quote_text: Just because you don't got a big chain doesn't mean you don't gotta feel like you ain't got a big chain. Having a big chain is a feeling. You gon' wake up in the morning and feel good and feel like you got a big chain.
author: N.O.R.E.

quote_text: The last mile is always the least crowded.
author: Russ

quote_text: Get out of your own way, trust me bro, that's so vital.
author: Russ

quote_text: I can't be controlled with program and presets.
author: Kanye West

quote_text: We the only clique taking risk, touching live, f**k your hits... I been getting at these coins as I'm breaking down the brick. Make the jump to each level, Super Mario exists.
author: Pusha T

quote_text: Finding a way to stay out of the way.
author: Drake

quote_text: Don't try to force a square peg in a round circle, that sh*t'll hurt you.
author: Nas

quote_text: If it costs you your peace, it is too expensive.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote_text: If you want to make change, it's going to take a minute.
author: Joey Bada$$

quote_text: I strive for perfection; at the same time I'm accepting the fact that there'll never be nothing perfect about.
author: Royce da 5'9"

quote_text: Stop dueling with the true thing, I do think. When you think too much you're removing what's moving.
author: Andr√© 3000

quote_text: I got now, later, and I got next.
author: G-Eazy

quote_text: The stronger the assumption that the future will function as today does, the greater the gravitational force of the status quo.
author: Pier Fornica

quote_text: One of the first boats I've seen is on Nautica Sweats.
author: Dave East

quote_text: Do you deceive yourself and let your ego swell? And disregard those who most need your help.
author: Nas and Damian Marley

quote_text: It's a journey, some will get left behind, cause in life, you cannot press rewind.
author: Nas and Damian Marley

quote_text: Warmheartedness could soon betray you, it proves fatal.
author: Nas

quote_text: Time to make a statement, time to free my mind of limitations.
author: Stormzy

quote_text: Any man with the plan is precise with his life.
author: Gang Starr

quote_text: I do not know anybody who's winning who's taking the time to leave negative comments.
author: Connor Price

quote_text: Success is a chain reaction, I'm the f**king missing link.
author: Big Sean

quote_text: Wasn't even dreaming this far, believe who you are. The sun doesn't even know it's a star.
author: Nas

quote_text: Trying to go farther. I finally arrived and nobody's here.
author: Cordae

quote_text: We all got a set of tools we gotta use to push through.
author: Nas

quote_text: By the time you see the stars in the skies, they already burnt out.
author: Nas
source_title: One a Man, Twice a Child

quote_text: Fear will make you reveal who you really are.
author: Nas

quote_text: I'll have you time travelling, have your mind babbling. People trying to inherit the skill, so they asking me.
author: Nas

quote_text: And I could give a f**k what category you place me. Long as when I'm pushing up daisies and gone, as long as you place me amongst one of them greats.
author: Eminem

quote_text: Know what God said when He made the first rainbow? Just throw this at the end if I'm too late for the intro.
author: Kanye West

quote_text: I'm in my studio now, if you're looking for your future, look at who you're around. If they ain't pullin' their weight, they're gonna be pullin' you down.
author: Doneze, Keali'i

quote_text: New vendettas attached, and we can't never get back. Now you can never relax. Think it's a game until they holding onto your brains and sh*t, do you?
author: Meek Mill

quote_text: You're unhappy, and I can see it when you cry.
author: Mase

quote_text: When you give your time, you're giving a portion of your time that you're never getting back.
author: Fabolous

quote_text: The money comes, the money goes, but the time you never get it back.
author: Fabolous

quote_text: Because who I love can hurt me.
author: Big Sean

quote_text: Playing in the sand.
author: Lil Wayne

quote_text: I didn't come this far to only come this far. You got to give yourself credit cause they definitely won't.
author: Russ

quote_text: There are numerous ways you can choose to earn funds.
author: Mobb Deep

quote_text: I'm dying slow but the devil trying to rush me.
author: Lil Wayne

quote_text: If you got a problem with me, better walk around it.
author: Drake

quote_text: My mansion seems bigger through my boy's eyes.
author: Drake

quote_text: I went from going to school, to toting them tools and making a move. Said I would win, they said I would lose, sh*t. We're so confused, hope I don't make the news.
author: Meek Mill

quote_text: You know how we do, we do it for the people. And the struggles of the brothers and the folks, with lovers under dope, experiment to discover hopes.
author: Common

quote_text: I see death around the corner.
author: 2Pac

quote_text: People never get the flowers while they can still smell them.
author: Kanye West

quote_text: Take a few step backs and look at yourself. Matter of fact, take yourself outside your body and then look at yourself. See how you're playing yourself.
author: Meek Mill

quote_text: I don't never stress none of that sh*t from yesterday.
author: Rich Brian Guapdad 4000

quote_text: Cleaned out my closet, I got rid of all of my demons. If you learn one thing from my journey, n**a it's don't stop believing'. When this sht got so suffocating I could barely even keep breathin'. Wrote my wrongs all in this song, now I'd like to welcome y'all to my season.
author: Vic Mensa

quote_text: Be humble, sit down.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote_text: How you die thirty somethin' after banging all them years? Grammy nominated in the sauna shedding tears. All this money, power, fame and I can't make you reappear. But I don't wipe 'em though, we just embrace the only life we know. If it was me, I would tell you, "N***a, live your life and grow." I'd tell you, "Finish what we started, reach them heights, you know? And gas the V-12 to the pipe and smoke."
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote_text: You have to believe it when you cannot see it!
author: Meek Mill

quote_text: Don't mind me, I'm living my dream.
author: DJ Khaled

quote_text: When you already won, what the f**k is a race?
author: Nicki Minaj

quote_text: Sometimes I question whether this sh*t matters, putting substance into something in a world so used to instant gratification.
author: J. Cole

quote_text: Take it from a street dude, you don't need to be a street dude. Get a lawyer, read your contract, and eat food.
author: Nas

quote_text: Don't get stuck in how you feel. Say, "Jesus take the wheel." He knows the road that you need to take.
author: Kirk Franklin

quote_text: Maybe we should try and help somebody or be somebody, instead of being somebody that makes the news so everybody can tweet about it.
author: Drake

quote_text: Jealousy's itch, but thank God I conquered that, cause if not I'd never be rich.
author: J. Cole

quote_text: Nobody gives you roses while you can smell them, so I picked from my own garden.
author: Nas

quote_text: You can Richard Milli your left wrist.
author: BLANK

quote_text: Better have a strategy or you could be a statistic.
author: Kanye West
